Description: Rim and body sherd of North Ionian Late Wild Goat Style pottery plate; interior, white slip; on top of rim, key maeander; on floor, sequence of black, reserved and added red bands; exterior: unslipped, black band on edge of rim, two bands on wall. Repair hole on rim.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by the Museum of Classical Archaeology, Cambridge. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
For parallels, see British Museum 1886,0401.1309 and Bristol H2016.12.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.708)
